title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - anticipate objection

content.question: The speaker anticipates the objection that “preaching” (line 11) is

choices.label: a scandalous feature in a drama
an inappropriate element in a comedy
a deplorable practice in any social context

content.answer: an inappropriate element in a comedy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
